 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָ֑ס‎</span> **noun masculine** ==moth== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָסָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***sâsu***</u></abbr>, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 506</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Armen. Stud. § 2262</sup> compare Armenian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***zez***</u></abbr> = Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">σής</span>, which is derived from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָס‎</span> by [[BDB#Bo|Bo]]<sup>Hieroz. iii. 514</sup> [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup>Fremdw. 16 f.</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְכַצֶּמֶר יאֹכְלֵם סָ֑ס‎</span> [[Isa.51.8|Isa 51:8]].
